name: superchild
description: A smarter replacement for node.js's child_process module.

scripts.docs: node_modules/.bin/docco -l linear lib/superchild.js lib/json-sieve.js lib/unlogger.js && cat lib/superchild.js | egrep '^//' | sed  -E 's/^[ ]*\/\/[ ]{0,1}//' > README.md
scripts.coverage: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha $(find test -name "*.mocha.js") && rm -rf docs/coverage && mv coverage/lcov-report docs/coverage && rm -rf coverage

author: Mayank Lahiri <mayank@iceroad.io>
